price: 26. Loth crut alors en lui et dit : « Je quitte (cette terre pour aller) vers mon Seigneur. C’est Lui le Tout -Puissant, le Sage. »
arabic: ۞ فَـَٔامَنَ لَهُۥ لُوطٞۘ وَقَالَ إِنِّي مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faāmana lahu lūṭun waqāla innī muhājirun ilā rabbī innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
